Discover the best beard gifts for men this holiday season with our premium collection from Striking Viking. Pamper your man this holiday season with our Beard Grooming Kits, Beard Care Kits, Beard Growth Kits, Beard combs, Beard Balms, and Beard oils with a variety to choose from.

Online shopping from a great selection at VIKING Store.

Established in Kentucky, USA in 2015. The Striking Viking brand was born from our desire to help men all over the world take good care of their beards and wear them proudly. When it comes to a well-groomed beard, we have only one rule: settle for nothing but the best.

Striking Viking beard balm conditioners are made from organic and natural ingredients all designed to help your beard look and feel great! Our beard balm is nourishing and holds your style and comes in a variety of scents.

Striking Viking beard oil for men is made of organic and natural ingredients to help tame your beard, while also making it thicker, fuller and softer. Striking Viking beard care products for men will give you the confidence to conquer your world!

Striking Viking Beard Combs are durable, portable wood combs that evenly distribute naturally-occurring oils, thus producing an even, lustrous, and attractive appearance. Made out of 100% sandalwood, these beard combs are naturally tough and long lasting.
